directions: Mix avocado, black beans, lime juice, and garlic together in a microwave-safe bowl. Sprinkle with Cheddar cheese.
Microwave dip on high until cheese is melted, about 1 minute. Season with sea salt if desired.
ingredients: 1/2 (15 ounce) can black beans, drained and rinsed
1 clove garlic, minced, or more to taste
title: Avocado and Black Bean Dip
